featured.text: After delivering a very powerful speech, the award winner was _____ by a group of fans asking for her signature.

Both 36 know their own drawbacks and limitations very well; therefore, they jointly decide to have one last race—not to decide who the winner or loser is, but just for their own pleasure and satisfaction.

definition.zh_def: 獲勝者；在比賽或競爭中取得勝利的人或團隊。
definition.en_def: A person or team that wins a competition or contest.
definition.example: The winner of the race received a gold medal.
